stories.summary: OpenAI and Pacific Northwest National Laboratory introduce DraftNEPABench, a new benchmark evaluating how AI coding agents can accelerate federal permitting—showing potential to reduce NEPA drafting t

stories.headline: OpenAI Codex and Figma launch seamless code-to-design experience
stories.summary: OpenAI and Figma launch a new Codex integration that connects code and design, enabling teams to move between implementation and the Figma canvas to iterate and ship faster.

stories.headline: Will vibe coding end like the maker movement?
Disrupting malicious uses of AI | February 2026
stories.summary: Our latest threat report examines how malicious actors combine AI models with websites and social platforms—and what it means for detection and defense.

Arvind KC appointed Chief People Officer
stories.summary: OpenAI appoints Arvind KC as Chief People Officer to help scale the company, strengthen its culture, and lead how work evolves in the age of AI.

stories.headline: Bild AI (YC W25) Is Hiring Interns to Make Housing Affordable
Why we no longer evaluate SWE-bench Verified
stories.summary: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.

stories.headline: Nano Banana 2: Google's latest AI image generation model
Anthropic CEO stands firm as Pentagon deadline looms
stories.summary: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday that he "cannot in good conscience accede" to the Pentagon's demands to give the military unrestricted access to its AI systems.

stories.headline: Google paid startup Form Energy $1B for its massive 100-hour battery
stories.summary: The deal paves the way for Form Energy to raise a new funding round before potentially going public next year.

stories.headline: So, we’re getting Prada Meta AI glasses, right?
stories.summary: Mark Zuckerberg was at Prada's fashion week event in Milan, leaving everyone to wonder if we're getting Meta AI glasses under the Prada brand.

stories.headline: Sophia Space raises $10M seed to demo novel space computers
stories.summary: The company's modular computer tiles offer a new vision for space data centers.

stories.headline: Mistral AI inks a deal with global consulting giant Accenture
stories.summary: Mistral AI lands a partnership with Accenture, the consultant that has also recently announced partnerships with rivals OpenAI and Anthropic.
